item.title: CARGO DET AIR Indicating System (Main Deck/Lower Lobe) – Empty Cargo Handling Equipment Only

remarks.para: Indication(s) for associated cargo areas may be inoperative provided:

numlitem.para: Procedures are established and used to verify associated lower lobe cargo compartment remains empty, or contains only empty cargo handling equipment, ballast (ballast may be loaded in ULDs), or Fly Away Kits, and

Procedures are established and used to verify associated main deck cargo area(s) remain empty, or contain only empty cargo handling equipment, ballast (ballast may be loaded in ULDs), or Fly Away Kits.

note.para: UPS does not carry Fly Away Kits in voided cargo compartments.
The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

numlitem.para: Associated main deck and lower lobe cargo compartments remain empty or contains only empty cargo handling equipment.

placard.para: Placard below Captain’s PFD on P-1-1 panel: "CARGO DET AIR IND SYS INOP". Enter Item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
